SHARE_DESIGN_MESSAGE: Hope you like this blouse design, shared from "Blouse Design" App

ABOUT_MESSAGE:
Thanks for using our app.

This is a dedicated app for sharing blouse designs across the world.

This app is made with love by iYaffle Technologies.
HELP_MESSAGE: For any questions, ideas, suggestions, feedbacks & issues please feel free to email us at info@iYaffle.com and we would love to hear from you.
RATE_MESSAGE: If you enjoy using our app, would you mind taking a moment to rate it? It won’t take more than a minute. Thanks for your support!
REMOTE_ERROR: Error reaching our server. Please retry again.
DEVICE_OFFLINE: Your device is now offline. To use this app, you need to be online.
INVALID_LOGIN: Invalid Login Details. Check email and password details.
PASSWORD_MISMATCH: Password and Confirm Password don't match
PASSWORD_RESET_FAIL: Email not in our system. Check the email address provided.
